Class App

java.lang.Object
edu.lehigh.cse216.team_m.backend.App
public class App extends Object
For now, our app creates an HTTP server that can only get and add data.

  • Method Details

    • getDatabaseConnection

      private static Database getDatabaseConnection()
      Get a fully-configured connection to the database, or exit immediately Uses the Postgres configuration from environment variables NB: now when we shutdown the server, we no longer lose all data
      Returns:
      null on failure, otherwise configured database object

    • getIntFromEnv

      static int getIntFromEnv(String envar, int defaultVal)
      Get an integer environment variable if it exists, and otherwise return the default value.
      Parameters:
      envar - The name of the environment variable to get.
      defaultVal - The integer value to use as the default if envar isn't found
      Returns:
      The best answer we could come up with for a value for envar

      public static void main(String[] args)
